property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. You may return that chosen creature to your opponent's hand. Then put a creature that costs the same as or less than that creature from your graveyard. ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature and their ability would trigger, that ability doesn't trigger instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one into your mana zone, one into your graveyard and one on the bottom of your deck.

If you do, you may cast the spell side of this creature in the battle zone for no cost.) ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent draws a second or subsequent card in that turn, you may also draw a card. TWINPACT ■ Choose up to 2 of your opponent's elements and return them to their owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose 2 players. Those players draw up to 3 cards. ■ Choose 2 players. Those players shieldify the top card of their deck.
